Ask animals about their daily routines and habits to gain insights into their behavior and lifestyle.
Ask animals about their communication methods and how they interact with each other to learn more about their social structure.
Ask animals about their emotions and feelings to gain a better understanding of their mental states.
Ask animals about their physical abilities and limitations to learn more about their evolutionary adaptations.
Ask animals about their natural habitats and how they interact with their environment to gain insights into ecology and conservation.
